lexUnit.name: stone.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: throw stones at in order to injure or kill.

sentence.text: ` We need love to break the chain of evil , " Jesus tells a crowd about to stone the prostitute Mary Magdalene ( rising star Barbara Hershey is badly miscast and totally unconvincing ) .
We tend to believe that it is only in Iran that people who commit adultery are stoned , whereas in Europe it 's the other way round .
In the Middle East more than 800 people were hanged , shot by firing squad or stoned to death in 1991 .
The local people had stoned her for wearing trousers in the street and Fernando had ruefully added how things had changed since then -- now anything went in Majorca .
Surely we should follow the example of Jesus in confronting the woman taken in adultery , who was about to be stoned .
The last great Neo philosopher , a woman , Hypatia , was stoned to death as she returned from a lecture at the library -- again by ` Christians " -- in A.D. 415 .
Put her in a hole and stoned her and covered her up with earth before she was dead .
Then , one by one , they were stoned to death .
The girl was to be guarded until she delivered , at which time she was to be stoned to death .
In A.D. 36 , for example , Stephen , usually hailed as Christianity 's first martyr , was stoned to death in Jerusalem , and many Nazareans fled the city .
Mikey Smith was stoned to death but his words live on de same
His father became a Protestant lecturer in England , and according to his son a Catholic mob stoned him to death .
Some of the Phocaeans had been stoned to death by the Etruscans of Caere , traditional philhellenes ; some had to move to Elea in southern Italy .
He seems to have lost the knack when he most needed it , for he was stoned to death by unimpressed heathens .
In some countries in the world you would be stoned to death .
There was no one about apart from a couple of youths stoning the seagulls with empty beer bottles .
He might even try to inflame the menfolk of Banda into stoning Jane .
` When in doubt , always stone the police . "
They led the dogs to a place where the river meandered and the shingle bank was broad and deserted , and they beat them with sticks or stoned them .

Initial reports indicated hundreds had been killed when a military unit had been stoned by a hungry and unruly mob .
But , in a sinister turn of events , firemen were stoned by gangs of youths as they tried to deal with several out-of-control bonfires on Merseyside .
Firefighters were stoned at Harris Street , Bootle , where a fire had been lighted on a railway goods line .
Soldiers guard a three-mile section of the ` Hell 's Highway " to the popular Natal coastline where 70 motorists have been stoned and shot at .
Next day Westerners were stoned .
Even the firemen were stoned as they tried to put out the fires . "
